statements: SELECT * FROM player_contracts;
SELECT player_id, player_name, contract_amount FROM player_contracts WHERE trade_agreement = TRUE;
SELECT player_name, contract_amount FROM player_contracts WHERE salary_cap_management = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 1000000;
SELECT player_id, player_name, contract_amount FROM player_contracts ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 100000 AND trade_agreement = TRUE ORDER BY player_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, SUM(contract_amount) AS total_contract_amount FROM player_contracts GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_contract_amount > 500000
SELECT player_name, contract_amount FROM player_contracts WHERE salary_cap_management = TRUE ORDER BY contract_amount DESC, player_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS total_players FROM player_contracts
SELECT player_name, contract_amount FROM player_contracts WHERE salary_cap_management = FALSE OR trade_agreement = FALSE ORDER BY contract_amount ASC, player_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM players
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM players
SELECT player_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM players
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id, contract_start_date FROM players
SELECT * FROM trade_agreements
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM players WHERE contract_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, team_id, contract_end_date FROM players ORDER BY team_id ASC, contract_end_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_id, contract_start_date FROM players WHERE team_id = 2 AND contract_start_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT player_name, sending_team_id, trade_date FROM trade_agreements WHERE sending_team_id <> receiving_team_id;
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts;
SELECT player_id, start_date, end_date FROM PlayerContracts WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT agreement_id, player_id, trade_date FROM TradeAgreements ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, current_salary_cap FROM SalaryCapManagement WHERE remaining_cap < 1000000;
SELECT player_id, MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM PlayerContracts GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agreement_id, player_id, team_id FROM TradeAgreements WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, SUM(salary) AS total_salary FROM PlayerContracts GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_salary > 300000 ORDER BY total_salary DESC;
SELECT pc.player_id, sa.current_salary_cap, sa.remaining_cap FROM PlayerContracts pc JOIN SalaryCapManagement sa ON pc.player_id = sa.team_id;
SELECT pc.player_id, COUNT(*) AS contract_count FROM PlayerContracts pc GROUP BY pc.player_id HAVING contract_count >= 2 ORDER BY contract_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM player_contracts;
SELECT player_id, contract_amount, contract_duration FROM player_contracts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, contract_amount, signing_date FROM player_contracts ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT trade_id, receiving_team_id, sending_team_id, trade_date FROM trade_agreements WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT player_id, games_played, batting_average, home_runs FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
SELECT player_id, contract_amount FROM player_contracts;
SELECT trade_id, receiving_team_id, trade_date FROM trade_agreements ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, batting_average, home_runs FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
SELECT trade_id, receiving_team_id, sending_team_id FROM trade_agreements WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_id, current_cap, cap_space FROM salary_cap_management WHERE current_cap > cap_space;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 1
SELECT id, name, position, salary FROM player WHERE team_id = 2
SELECT * FROM team WHERE team_name = 'Lakers'
SELECT player_id, team_id, start_date, end_date FROM contract
SELECT * FROM player WHERE age > 25
SELECT player.name, player.position, team.team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id
SELECT player.name, team.team_name, contract.amount FROM player JOIN contract ON player.id = contract.player_id JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id
SELECT player.name, SUM(salary) AS total_salary FROM player GROUP BY player.name
SELECT player.name, team.team_name, trade.trade_id FROM player JOIN trade ON player.id = trade.player1_id JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id
